Name: Kyralessa
AboutMe:
.NET developer. Started in VBA, then moved to VB .NET, then to C#.

Have you tried Git? It'll change your programming life. Once you really learn it, you'll wonder how you lived without it.

Have you tried F#? It's like a concise, less-ugly C#.

Have you tried NCrunch? It's my new favorite thing ever.

Imagine not having to Alt-Tab over to NUnit or xUnit, but running your tests right in Visual Studio.

Now imagine running your tests without having to build first.

Now imagine running your tests without even having to save first.

Imagine someone sitting beside you all day and double-checking that the unit tests pass every time you press a key.

That's NCrunch.

Sounds crazy but it's pretty amazing, actually.
